permissionsScreen.title: Permissions
permissionsScreen.heading: Allow Access
permissionsScreen.permissionsBody: This app will send you notifications and use your location to provide the best experience. Please press the button below and grant access.

welcomeScreen.missionStatement: We strive to provide the Oakland Chinatown Community with a resource for promoting safety and community. We aim to embrace the often forgotten, underserved, and vulnerable. We promote compassion not indifference, unity as opposed to divisiveness. Fostering a more caring and safer Oakland for all.

signUpScreen.title: Sign up
signUpScreen.description: Welcome and THANK YOU for your interest in helping to keep our community safer! These are unprecedented times and we are so grateful for your time and efforts. Please fill in this form in its entirety. You will also find our policies at the bottom of the form - please read them, understand them, and reach out if you have any questions. Please note: Due to the overwhelming amount of submissions, there may be a delay in the the response time as we schedule upcoming onboarding sessions. For the safety of our volunteers and the community we are serving, we are asking that ALL volunteers doing in-person work to get tested for COVID-19 and to submit a screenshot/photo of your results at the time of your shift, and complete a 1 hour onboarding session.
signUpScreen.emergencyContact: Emergency Contact (Name, Phone number, and Relationship)

roleSelectScreen.title: Role Select
roleSelectScreen.chaperoneDescription: I would like to be a chaperone
roleSelectScreen.requesterDescription: I would like to request a chaperone.

homeScreen.title: Home
homeScreen.noneScheduledNoticeBold: You currently don’t have anything scheduled.
homeScreen.noticeText2: Chaperones cannot be requested within 48H of desired day.
homeScreen.noticeText3: You could make a immediate request by calling
homeScreen.noticeText4: or you can schedule a chaparone request.

demoScreen.title: What’s In This Stack?
demoScreen.tagLine: Congratulations, you’ve got a very advanced React Native app template here.  Take advantage of this boilerplate!
demoScreen.androidReactotronHint: If this doesn't work, ensure the Reactotron desktop app is running, run adb reverse tcp:9090 tcp:9090 from your terminal, and reload the app.
